data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will continue to bring mainly fine weather to Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day over the region with a rather large temperature difference between day and night. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China on Monday night to Tuesday at first. It will be cool in the morning and at night and very dry during the day over the region in the following couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251123","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
